name: Chroma Maze
description:
It's a race against the clock as you navigate through the ever changing maze of colors! The only problem is: the walls are only visible as you sacrifice your time. You must balance your remaining time, your vision, and a number of items with both positive and negative effects!

Originally created for Ludum Dare 31. Developed using LÖVE.


Controls
  • ARROWS or WASD - Move.
  • SPACEBAR - Reveal the walls of the maze. Holding down the spacebar makes your time deplete MUCH FASTER than normal!


Installation

Windows

  1. Download ChromaMazeWin32.zip for the 32-bit version, or ChromaMazeWin64.zip for the 64-bit version.
  2. Unzip the folder.
  3. Run ChromaMaze.exe.

Mac

  1. Download ChromaMazeOSX.zip.
  2. Unzip the folder.
  3. Run ChromaMaze app.


Please support this game!

For more news and info about Chroma Maze, follow @ChromaMaze on Twitter!
